page.title: 19MY LIFE
page.content: I live in Bishampton --------------- -------------------------We have a dog called Ben who was a stray. We have four fish and one tank. We are going to have a kitten, a girl so she gets some babies. We've got a rabbit and a pony called Honey which we sold. My sister ------ was very upset. I wasn't exactly happy either nor was anybody else. Our house is about 4OO years old and I sleep in the attic. It is quite scary. There are seventeen rooms in our house. I am eight and when I leave Flyford School I will be nine. I will be going to Pinvin School and then probably to Pershore High School. Then I'll go to University and I'll get a job. ------------- aged 8 from Bishampton July 1985.
